import {useState} from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navigation/Navbar' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SignIn() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", teachingArea: "", about: "", password: "", rePassword: "", }); const { firstName, lastName, email, teachingArea, about, password, rePassword, } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { setFormData((prevState)=>({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]:e.target.value })) }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
